issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
KitchenSink is staying frozen when opening and closing many windows/views very quickly.
Android and iPhone don't have such issue.
fields.summary: BlackBerry: KitchenSink is staying frozen in some cases

comments.body:
Verified fixed on:
Mac OSX 10.9 Mavericks
Titanium Studio, build: 3.2.0.201311122225
Titanium SDK, build: 3.2.0.v20131113094843
CLI: 3.2.0
Alloy: 1.3.0
BlackBerry Simulator: 10.2.0.1791

KitchenSink builds and installs on simulator. Nothing freezes, even when quickly opening and closing windows/views.
Closing.
